EmailTemplate.description: Use this template when Reminder(alert) send to respective PIC(person in charge) when ‘HOUSE BL TYPE’ is still ‘ORIGINAL’ and ‘STATUS OF ORIGINAL H B/L COLLECTION’ is ‘Expected to Collect’ after 1 week of ETA.
EmailTemplate.name: ORIGINAL BL COLLECTION ALERT
EmailTemplate.subject: Alert Email-ID: {!CustomObject1__c.Name}-ORIGINAL B/L COLLECTED?
